summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hotel Staff Roster Generator with focus on name column format and scheduling constraints. Backend APIs working at 94.1% success rate with only minor isolated off days issue. Frontend UI fully functional with correct name column format (Last name on top, First name • Position below), compact 120px width, and all core features working including roster generation, week/month view toggle, and Excel export.

flaky_endpoints.issue: 1 employee has isolated off days instead of consecutive pairs

passed_tests: Name column displays correctly: Last name on top (Brown), First name • Position below (Mike • AGSM)
Name column width is compact at exactly 120px as required
Day columns have adequate space for shift display
Roster generates with proper scheduling constraints
Night shifts (23) appear in 5-day consecutive blocks as required
Days off (0) appear in consecutive pairs (minor violation in 1 employee)
AGSM employees correctly assigned 9am shifts
Welcome Agent employees correctly assigned 9am shifts
Generate roster button works and creates complete schedule
Export Excel button works and is enabled after roster generation
Week/Month view toggle works perfectly with proper navigation
Week view shows exactly 7 days or less
Week navigation (prev/next) buttons work correctly
Employee management (add, delete, display) works correctly
Cell editing functionality works (dialog opens, shift selection works)
Position ordering correct: AGSM → GSC → GSA → Welcome Agent
Color coding verification (Night=blue, Days off=pink, Morning=red, Afternoon=green, 9am=yellow)
CSV upload zone present and functional
All CRUD operations on employees work
Business logic constraints properly implemented (5 work days + 2 days off per week)
Min 11 hours between shifts constraint working (no AM to PM next day without off)
Shift type transitions use days off properly
